plain: Based on the list of movies provided, it can be inferred that the user enjoys action, thriller, and horror genres. They likely prefer complex and twisty plots, as many of the movies on the list are known for their unexpected turns. The user may have a preference for darker and more intense musical scores, as many of the movies on the list are known for their suspenseful and atmospheric soundtracks. The user may prefer a moody and tense mood for the musical score, as many of the movies on the list are known for their suspenseful and intense scenes. The user may have a preference for urban and gritty settings, as many of the movies on the list are set in city environments. The user may prefer a visual style that is realistic and grounded, as many of the movies on the list are known for their practical effects and lack of CGI. The user may prefer a writing style that is detailed and immersive, as many of the movies on the list are known for their well-developed characters and intricate storylines. The user may prefer movies with a runtime of around 2 hours, as many of the movies on the list are of that length. The user may enjoy themes of suspense, mystery, and action, as many of the movies on the list explore these themes in depth.
